Privacy Policy
Betsson does not collect, store, or share any personal information. All data you enter into the app (receipts, photos, categories) is stored locally on your device and never uploaded to any server.
We do not use any third-party analytics or advertising tools.
Your data is yours. You can delete all data at any time from the app’s profile section.
If you uninstall the app, all stored data will be permanently lost.
This privacy policy is subject to change if we introduce online features in future versions. We’ll notify users before any changes that affect data handling.
For questions, contact us at support@betsson.app
